mapper.select: select cid, cname, m2.name, date_full, room_num from course c, member m1, member m2 where m1.userid=#{userid} and c.prid=m1.userid and c.inid=m2.userid order by date_full
select s.userid stid, s.name sname, attend_rate from member s, student_in_course sic where s.userid=sic.stid and cid=#{cid} order by name asc

select ncs_name, type, sum(answer) sum from (select distinct ncs_name, type, tid, date_test,ncs_num from test_paper where cid=#{cid}) a left outer join test_result tr on a.tid=tr.tid and tr.stid=#{stid} group by ncs_name, type,a.ncs_num, a.date_test order by a.date_test asc, a.ncs_num asc
select distinct(c.cid), c.cname, t.ncs_name, t.ncs_num, t.date_session from course c,test t where c.cid=#{cid} and c.cid=t.cid order by t.date_session asc

select a.name, NVL(to_char(sum(b.answer)),'미실시') sum from (select st.name, st.userid from member st, student_in_course sic where st.userid=sic.stid and sic.cid=#{cid}) a left outer join (select st.userid, answer from member st, test_result tr where st.userid=tr.stid and tid=#{tid} ) b on a.userid=b.userid group by name order by name

select a.name, NVL(to_char(sum(b.answer)),'미실시') sum from (select st.name, st.userid from member st, student_in_course sic where st.userid=sic.stid and cid=#{cid}) a left outer join (select st.userid, answer from member st, test_result tr where st.userid=tr.stid and tid=#{tid}) b on a.userid=b.userid group by name order by sum desc, name asc

select a.name, NVL(to_char(sum(b.answer)),'미실시') sum from (select st.name, st.userid from member st, student_in_course sic where st.userid=sic.stid and cid=#{cid}) a left outer join (select st.userid, answer from member st, test_result tr where st.userid=tr.stid and tid=#{tid}) b on a.userid=b.userid group by name order by sum asc, name asc

select i.name name, t.date_session, t.date_test, c.cname, s.name sname, t.ncs_name, p.name pname, t.ncs_num from member i, test t, course c, member s, member p, student_in_course sic where s.userid=sic.stid and sic.cid=c.cid and c.cid=t.cid and p.userid=c.prid and i.userid=c.inid and s.userid=#{stid} and t.tid=#{tid}
select tp.ques_area, tp.ques_num, tp.question, tr.answer from test_paper tp, test_result tr where tp.tid=tr.tid and tp.ques_num=tr.ques_num and tp.tid=#{tid} and stid=#{stid} order by tp.ques_num

select ques_area, count(ques_num) count, sum(answer) sum, round(avg(answer),1) avg from (select test_result.tid, test_paper.ques_area, test_result.ques_num, answer, stid from test_result, test_paper where test_result.ques_num = test_paper.ques_num and test_result.tid=#{tid} and test_paper.tid=#{tid} and stid=#{stid}) group by ques_area
select cid, cname name from course where prid=#{userid}
select distinct c.cid, t.ncs_name name from test t, member m, course c where m.userid=c.prid and t.cid=c.cid and m.userid=#{userid} order by c.cid
select DISTINCT ncs_num from test where ncs_name=#{ncs_name}
select DISTINCT ncs_name from test where ncs_num=#{ncs_num}
select userid from member where name=#{sname}
select name sname from member where userid=#{stid}
select cid from course where cname=#{cname}
select cname from course where cid=#{cid}
select tid from test where cid=#{cid} and ncs_name=#{ncs_num} and type=#{type}
